subNodes.conversationText: Welcome to Malkin. You are about to begin the game's tutorial. The tutorial covers basic controls and combat.
Are you sure? You also get a little bonus XP.
Yes. I just need to see the fox. (TESTING ONLY, WILL LEAD TO UNSTABLE GAME.)
Welcome to Malkin. You are about to begin the game's tutorial. The tutorial covers basic controls and combat.
Welcome to Malkin. You are about to begin the game's tutorial. The tutorial covers basic controls and combat.
Welcome to Malkin. You are about to begin the game's tutorial. The tutorial covers basic controls and combat.
You... Why are you here? Have you come to mock me?
"To see the puzzle in your rotten heart."
To kill the one who killed her.
The spirits -- for spirits they were, the immortal kami of the woods -- laughed.
But the spirits were already gone.

An old witch had been standing by, invisible and unnoticed, as the beings conversed. When the spirits left, she left too, riding the night wind back to her cottage. The grass hardly bent as she passed, and the trees hardly shook.

She had heard enough, and she knew what she had to do.
Welcome to Malkin. You are about to begin the game's tutorial. The tutorial covers basic controls and combat.
Yes. I just need to see the fox. (TESTING ONLY, WILL LEAD TO UNSTABLE GAME.)
Written, scored, and designed by Zach HOLBROOK.
"And my more-having would be as a sauce To make me hunger more." Macbeth,IV.iii.
